Package au.csiro.pathling.sql

Interface SqlExtensions

  • public interface SqlExtensions
    Custom dataset operations.

      static <I,​R,​S>

    • Method Detail

      • mapWithPartitionPreview

        @Nonnull
static <I,​R,​S> Dataset<Row> mapWithPartitionPreview​(@Nonnull
                                                                Dataset<Row> ds,
                                                                @Nonnull
                                                                Column inputColumn,
                                                                @Nonnull
                                                                ObjectDecoder<I> columnDecoder,
                                                                @Nonnull
                                                                MapperWithPreview<I,​R,​S> mapper,
                                                                @Nonnull
                                                                StructField resultField)
        Creates a new Dataset with the additional column as specified in resultField with the results of mapping each of the rows in the input dataset. The mapping extracts the value of the specified input column from the input dataset and the uses the provided mapper to (a) create a state for each partition, and; (b) to map the values for each row given access to per partition state.
        Type Parameters:
        I - input type of the mapper
        R - result type of the mapper
        S - state type of the mapper
        Parameters:
        ds - the input dataset
        inputColumn - the column to extract from the input dataset
        columnDecoder - the decoder to use to convert the extracted column value to the input type of the mapper
        mapper - the mapping operation to use. The mapper will be allowed to preview all input objects in the dataset partition and create the state for them
        resultField - the definition of the column with the result of the mapping
        Returns:
        the dataset with an additional column as specified in the resultField with the results of the mapping operation for each row
